title: Cybersecurity Community
overview: Discord server with 1200+ members focused on cybersecurity education, CTF challenges, and ethical hacking resources.
challenges: Founded and managed a thriving Discord community of over 1,200 cybersecurity enthusiasts. The server provides educational resources, CTF challenges, mentorship, and a collaborative environment for learning ethical hacking and cybersecurity best practices.
outcome: 1200+ member community with active engagement in CTF competitions, mentorship, and career development.
